title: SJEG24 - Snow Joe Edge 2-In-1 24-Inch Poly Blade Snow Pusher and Ice Chopper - Live Demo
description:
Access the SJEG24 Snow Pusher/Ice Chopper

BRING IT ON, WEATHERMAN! Tackle snow and ice with the Snow Joe Edge 2-in-1 snow shovel and built in 5-IN ice chopper. No more spending time lugging out a heavy shovel and ice chopper. This ultimate winter tool does it both! It’s easy to go from shovel to ice chopper by simply sliding out the ice chopper head from the shovel base, no tools required at all. The Snow Joe SJEG24 has a 24-IN x 11-IN poly scoop and D-Grip handle to easily handle all snow types. Ergonomic and lightweight, the Snow Joe Edge makes tough winter chores easy. This model also includes a steel wear strip for extended scoop life.

24-IN snow shovel/pusher
5-IN steel ice chopper
Aluminum wear strip
Coated steel tube
Polypropylene cold-resistant scoop
Cushioned foam grip for comfort
Measures 55-IN in length
Weighs 3.66-pounds
D-shaped grip

asset.author: Snow Joe + Sun Joe
asset.hookText:
Access the SJEG24 Snow Pusher/Ice Chopper here: http://www.snowjoe.com/product/Snow-Joe-Edge-2-In-1-24-Inch-Poly-Blade-Snow-Pusher-and-Ice-Chopper-Blue-SJEG24.

transcripts: Tackle your toughest winter tasks with the Edge 2-In-1 snow shovel and ice chopper from Snow Joe. The 24 inch cold resistant shovel with aluminum wear strip makes light work of heavy snow, slush, and sleet. And with the quick disconnect the built in 5 inch steel blade blasts through ice and chops up compacted snow. A padded foam grip and ergonomic handle provide extra comfort and leverage for maximum result with minim strength. At only 3.6 pounds the Snow Joe Edge is the one snow tool that does it all. From the first frost to the last flake. This winter get the edge when you go with Joe. The 2 in 1 snow shovel and ice chopper from Snow Joe. Get equipped.
